properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 23rd January 2024** Opening Tuesday 23rd January 2024 Everyone is welcome! You are welcome to our Tuesday warm space! properties.title: NoFit State Community Circus

properties.address: No Fit State Circus, Cardiff, South Glamorgan CF24 1LE
properties.description: A welcome space for all ages of the community in Splott, Adamsdown, Tremorfa, assisted housing and asylum seekers/refugees. NoFit State Community Circus has a focus on the circus arts and mental well-being for our community . We provide a family area, with the option to do circus play with our trainers, whilst also offering a quiet space for focus . Snacks and refreshment available. Open every Tuesday between 10:30 - 17:00 from September 2024 to March 2025

properties.description: Free hot drinks and homemade cake at our weekly coffee morning. We also have a weekly drop-in session with Riverside Advice offering support around debt, benefits and housing.
